action: In general, a standard system update will make all the necessary changes.
description:
It was discovered that SoX incorrectly handled certain inputs. If a
user or an automated system were tricked into opening a specially crafted
input file, an attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial
of service.
isummary:
SoX could be made to crash if it received specially crafted
input.
